properties.description: Updates the Cow Dim table in the PostGreDWH, by inserting new cows and updating excisting ones with new information while flagging old ones as on

transformations.name: activeDBcows
transformations.description: filter end_dates with a null value

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as long,
		condition as string,
		life_number as string,
		responder1 as long,
		responder2 as long,
		responder3 as string,
		number as integer,
		uuid as string,
		group_id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingCows
source(output(
		dim_cow_id as integer,
		lifenumber as string,
		leg_responder as long,
		neck_responder as long,
		cownumber as integer,
		nedap_id as long,
		start_date as date,
		end_date as date,
		group as integer,
		last_updated as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DWHCows
CreateDateTimestamp1 filter(isNull(end_date) == true()) ~> activeDBcows
activeDBcows, StagingCows exists(lifenumber == life_number,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'left')~> removedcows
activeDBcows, StagingCows exists(lifenumber == life_number,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> activatecows
DWHCows derive(current_date = currentDate(),
		yesterday = addDays(currentDate(),-1),
		current_timestamp = currentTimestamp(),
		end_date = toDate(null())) ~> CreateDateTimestamp1
removedcows alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> UpdateIfTrue1
CreateDateTimestamp2, activatecows exists(life_number == lifenumber,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NewCowsLookup
StagingCows derive(current_date = currentDate(),
		current_timestamp = currentTimestamp(),
		end_date = toDate(null())) ~> CreateDateTimestamp2
activatecows, StagingCows join(lifenumber == life_number,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CombineApiDimCow
CombineApiDimCow split(leg_responder == responder1 && neck_responder == responder2 && group == group_id && cownumber == number,
	disjoint: false) ~> split1@(NoUpdateAvailable, UpdateAvailable)
split1@NoUpdateAvailable alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> UpdateIfTrue2
split1@UpdateAvailable alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> UpdateIfTrue3
UpdateIfTrue1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		dim_cow_id as integer,
		lifenumber as string,
		leg_responder as long,
		neck_responder as long,
		cownumber as integer,
		nedap_id as long,
		start_date as date,
		end_date as date,
		group as integer,
		last_updated as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['dim_cow_id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		dim_cow_id,
		lifenumber,
		leg_responder,
		neck_responder,
		cownumber,
		nedap_id,
		start_date,
		end_date = yesterday,
		group,
		last_updated
	)) ~> SetCowEnddate1
NewCowsLookup sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		dim_cow_id as integer,
		lifenumber as string,
		leg_responder as long,
		neck_responder as long,
		cownumber as integer,
		nedap_id as long,
		start_date as date,
		end_date as date,
		group as integer,
		last_updated as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		lifenumber = life_number,
		leg_responder = responder1,
		neck_responder = responder2,
		cownumber = number,
		nedap_id = id,
		start_date = current_date,
		group = group_id,
		last_updated = current_timestamp,
		end_date
	)) ~> SetCowNew1
UpdateIfTrue2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		dim_cow_id as integer,
		lifenumber as string,
		leg_responder as long,
		neck_responder as long,
		cownumber as integer,
		nedap_id as long,
		start_date as date,
		end_date as date,
		group as integer,
		last_updated as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['dim_cow_id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		dim_cow_id,
		lifenumber,
		leg_responder,
		neck_responder,
		cownumber,
		nedap_id,
		start_date,
		end_date,
		group,
		last_updated = current_timestamp
	)) ~> UpdateCowLastUpdated
split1@UpdateAvailable sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		dim_cow_id as integer,
		lifenumber as string,
		leg_responder as long,
		neck_responder as long,
		cownumber as integer,
		nedap_id as long,
		start_date as date,
		end_date as date,
		group as integer,
		last_updated as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		lifenumber = life_number,
		leg_responder = responder1,
		neck_responder = responder2,
		cownumber,
		nedap_id = id,
		start_date = current_date,
		end_date,
		group = group_id,
		last_updated = current_timestamp
	)) ~> SetCowNew2
UpdateIfTrue3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		dim_cow_id as integer,
		lifenumber as string,
		leg_responder as long,
		neck_responder as long,
		cownumber as integer,
		nedap_id as long,
		start_date as date,
		end_date as date,
		group as integer,
		last_updated as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['dim_cow_id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		dim_cow_id,
		lifenumber,
		leg_responder,
		neck_responder,
		cownumber,
		nedap_id,
		start_date,
		end_date = yesterday,
		group,
		last_updated
	)) ~> SetCowEnddate2
